content: Hello! Thanks for contacting XYZ Home Services. How can we help you today? Do you need help with plumbing, electrical, or HVAC services?
Hi there, I need some plumbing help at my house.
Great, we can assist you with plumbing! May I get your name, please?
Thank you, John! Can you please provide your address so we can check availability for our plumbing team?
Thanks, John! Can you let me know a good date and time for us to come by and take care of your plumbing issue?
Actually, can we hold off on booking for now? I’m waiting to hear from my insurance to see if they’ll cover the repair.

Absolutely, John! No problem at all. If you decide to move forward or if your insurance gives the go-ahead, just let us know and we’ll get you scheduled right away. Is there anything else I can help with today?
No, that’s all for now. Thanks so much!
You’re welcome, John! We’re here whenever you’re ready. Have a great day!
reason: Customer declined to schedule, awaiting insurance.
